ARABIC: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَرَقَ ٱلسَّمْعَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except for the one who listens stealthily, and he is followed by an open flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Except the ones who listen on the sly, yet they are chased away by a shooting flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: save him who may eavesdrop, and then a bright flame pursues him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except for those who stealthily try to listen to the heavens, but who are chased away by a bright flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except one who comes to eavesdrop – therefore a bright flame goes after him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except him (devil) who steals the hearing, then he is pursued by a clear flaming fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But he who steals a hearing, so there follows him a visible flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: excepting such as listens by stealth -- and he is pursued by a manifest flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Save him who stealeth the hearing, and them doth a clear flame pursue.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but if anyone eavesdrops, he is pursued by a bright flaming fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Save him who stealeth the hearing, and him there followeth a flame gleaming.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: except someone who may eavesdrop, whereat there pursues him a manifest flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But any that gains a hearing by stealth, is pursued by a flaming fire, bright (to see).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except him (devil) that gains hearing by stealing, he is pursued by a clear flaming fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Except for he who steals the listening and is then pursued by a visible flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except one who steals a hearing, and is followed by a visible projectile.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:18] except the one who listens by stealth — he is pursued by a clear flame, a shining meteor that burns him, or pierces him or drives him insane.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Save him who stealeth the hearing, and them doth a clear flame pursue) they are pursued by a bright, burning star.
